long:
Meaning: "a house" (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.).
Usage: court, daughter, door, + dungeon, family, + forth of, Ã— great as would contain, hangings, home(born), (winter) house(-hold), inside(-ward), palace, place, + prison, + steward, + tablet, temple, web, + within(-out).
Source: probably from "H1129" abbreviated;
